Package com.newmainsoftech.spray.sprex.web.servlet.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InternationalizationConfigCase  
    ViewResolverConfigCase  
    ViewResolverConfigCase.SupportingMediaTypeCase
    Interface for holder of Media types what ViewResolverConfigCase implementing class supports.
    ViewResolverDefinitionInjectorCase  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InternationalizationConfig  
    StaticViewResolver
    ViewResolver for static view (what do not involve no controller logic.)
    By default, returns StaticViewResolver.StaticResourceView instance as view when adequate.
    StaticViewResolver.StaticResourceView
    View just for static resource.
    This just forwards request to target static resource.
    ViewResolverConfig
    @Configuration implementation for view resolver configuration.
    This is for configuring the following view resolvers: ContentNegotiatingViewResolver StaticViewResolver XmlViewResolver InternalResourceViewResolver
    (Please note that you can have only one InternalResourceViewResolver bean per application.)
    ViewResolverConfig.SupportingMediaType
    Holder of Media types what ViewResolverConfig supports.
    ViewResolverDefinitionInjector
    Default implementation of ViewResolverDefinitionInjectorCase interface to adds view resolver beans to application context.
    This is developed due to that BeanDefinitionRegistryPostProcessor and PostConstruct does not work (broken) with @Configuration of Spring' JavaConfig (but BeanFactoryPostProcessor.) For more info regarding this issue, refer to https://jira.springsource.org/browse/SPR-8269 http://forum.springsource.org/showthread.php?56712-PostConstruct-and-PreDestroy-in-JavaConfig https://jira.springsource.org/browse/SPR-7868 http://forum.springsource.org/showthread.php?56712-PostConstruct-and-PreDestroy-in-JavaConfig This implementation add the following view resolver beans: BeanNameViewResolver bean
    Adding BeanNameViewResolver bean by default because, as nature of JavaConfig, BeanNameViewResolver became to make more sense than XML config era.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ViewResolverConfig.ViewResolverOrder  
    ViewResolverConfigCase.SupportingMediaTypeCase.SupportingMediaTypeCommonDefualtValue  
    ViewResolverConfigCase.ViewResolverConfigCommonDefualtValue
